page.title: 11B.A.S.
page.content: B.A.S. stands for{Buckden Auto {Salvage.}One man began this firm.He had 1 lorry and three skips ten years ago.The firm has grown.He now has{9 {lorries, 1 mobile crane,500 skips and {1 skipeater,}which collects the rubbish from the skips. The skipeater has a red dragon painted on the side. It cost Â£69,000.It empties refuse twice a day in the nearby{refuse {disposal tip,}where all the rubbish that the firm collects goes.It is close to his office.He now employs 9 men & a secretary. He covers a radius of about{25 miles.}He also runs the local{Bottle Bank}service. He takes all the glass to Harlow. This runs at a loss at the moment.
